name: The Other Guy
description:
The Other Guy Made for GMTK 2021 Game Jam by Poached Studios. Topic : Joined Together

Solve puzzles in this platformer by opening Gates and Bridges to complete levels.
You can always call on the Other Guy to help!

The Other Guy is joined together to the player's movement, but in inverse!!

Don't forget to reunite before exiting.

Controls: 

Movement: A to move left - D to move Right
 Press Space once to Jump
 After Jumping , press space again to double jump.
 You can only single jump if The Other Guy is summoned.

The Other Guy: Press LMB to call the other guy to the character's left side. 
RMB to call the other guy to the character's right side.
Either LMB or RMB to call back the other guy when near him.

Please do give feedback!!
